00123 cache_content_status_t cache_content_read_conf_client_parameter( config_file_t in_config,
00124                                                                  cache_content_client_parameter_t * pparam ) 
00125 {
00126   int     blk_index ;
00127   int     var_max ;
00128   int     var_index ;
00129   int     err ;
00130   char *  key_name ;
00131   char *  key_value ;
00132   
00133   int  DebugLevel   = -1;
00134   char * LogFile    = NULL;
00135 
00136    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00137   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00138     return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00139 
00140   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00141   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_CLIENT ) ) < 0 )
00142     {
00143       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_CLIENT ) ; */
00144       return CACHE_CONTENT_NOT_FOUND ;
00145     }
00146   
00147   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00148 
00149   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00150     {
00151       /* Get key's name */
00152       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00153                                       blk_index,
00154                                       var_index,
00155                                       &key_name,
00156                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00157         {
00158           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00159                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_CLIENT ) ;
00160           return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00161         }
00162   
00163       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) ) 
00164         {
00165           pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00166         }
00167       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid" ) )  
00168         {
00169           pparam->lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid = atoi( key_value ) ;
00170         } 
00171       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )  
00172         {
00173           pparam->nb_prealloc_entry = atoi( key_value ) ;
00174         }
00175       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Cache_Directory" ) )
00176         {
00177           strcpy( pparam->cache_dir, key_value ) ;
00178         }
00179       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Refresh_FSAL_Force" )  ) 
00180         {
00181               pparam->flush_force_fsal = atoi( key_value ) ;
00182         }
00183       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DebugLevel" ) )
00184         {
00185           DebugLevel = ReturnLevelAscii( key_value );
00186 
00187           if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00188           {
00189             DisplayLog("cache_content_read_conf: ERROR: Invalid debug level name: \"%s\".",
00190                   key_value );
00191             return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00192           }
00193         }
00194       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LogFile" ) )
00195         {
00196 
00197           LogFile = key_value ;
00198         }
00199       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Max_Fd" ) )
00200         {
00201           pparam->max_fd_per_thread = atoi( key_value ) ;
00202         }
00203       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "OpenFile_Retention" ) )
00204         {
00205           pparam->retention = atoi( key_value ) ;
00206         }
00207       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_OpenClose_cache" ) )
00208         {
00209           pparam->use_cache = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00210         }
00211       else
00212         {
00213           fprintf( stderr,
00214                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00215                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_CLIENT ) ;
00216           return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00217         }
00218     }
00219     
00220     /* init logging */
00221   
00222     if ( LogFile )
00223     {
00224       desc_log_stream_t  log_stream;
00225 
00226       strcpy( log_stream.path , LogFile );
00227 
00228       /* Default : NIV_CRIT */
00229 
00230       if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00231         AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00232             V_FILE, log_stream, NIV_CRIT, SUP);
00233       else         
00234         AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00235             V_FILE, log_stream, DebugLevel, SUP);
00236 
00237     }
00238   
00239         
00240   return CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00241 } /* cache_content_read_conf_client_parameter */
00242 
00243 
00244 
00245 
00258 void cache_content_print_conf_client_parameter( FILE * output,  
00259                                                 cache_content_client_parameter_t param ) 
00260 {
00261   fprintf( output, "FileContent Client: LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize   = %d\n", param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc ) ;
00262   fprintf( output, "FileContent Client: LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid  = %d\n", param.lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid ) ;
00263   fprintf( output, "FileContent Client: Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize = %d\n", param.nb_prealloc_entry ) ;
00264   fprintf( output, "FileContent Client: Cache Directory         = %s\n", param.cache_dir ) ;
00265 } /* cache_content_print_conf_client_parameter */
00266 
00279 cache_content_status_t cache_content_read_conf_gc_policy( config_file_t               in_config,
00280                                                           cache_content_gc_policy_t * ppolicy )
00281 {
00282   int     blk_index ;
00283   int     var_max ;
00284   int     var_index ;
00285   int     err ;
00286   char *  key_name ;
00287   char *  key_value ;
00288 
00289   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00290   if( in_config == NULL || ppolicy == NULL  )
00291     return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00292 
00293   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00294   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_GCPOL ) ) < 0 )
00295     {
00296       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_GCPOL ) ; */
00297       return CACHE_CONTENT_NOT_FOUND ;
00298     }
00299 
00300   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00301   
00302   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00303     {
00304       /* Get key's name */
00305       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00306                                       blk_index,
00307                                       var_index,
00308                                       &key_name,
00309                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00310         {
00311           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00312             var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_GCPOL );
00313           return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00314         }
00315 
00316       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Lifetime" ) ) 
00317         {
00318           ppolicy->lifetime = atoi( key_value ) ;
00319         }
00320       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Inactivity_Before_Flush" ) ) 
00321         {
00322           ppolicy->inactivity_before_flush = atoi( key_value ) ;
00323         }
00324       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Runtime_Interval" ) )
00325         {
00326           ppolicy->run_interval = atoi( key_value ) ;
00327         }
00328       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Call_Before_GC" ) ) 
00329         {
00330           ppolicy->nb_call_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00331         }
00332      else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Df_HighWater" ) )
00333         {
00334           ppolicy->hwmark_df = atoi( key_value ) ;
00335         }
00336       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Df_LowWater" ) )
00337         {
00338           ppolicy->lwmark_df = atoi( key_value ) ;
00339         }
00340       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Emergency_Grace_Delay" ) ) 
00341         {
00342           ppolicy->emergency_grace_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00343         }
00344       else
00345         {
00346           fprintf( stderr,
00347                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00348                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_CONTENT_GCPOL ) ;
00349           return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00350         }
00351         
00352 
00353 
00354     }
00355   return CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00356 } /* cache_content_read_conf_gc_policy */
00357 
00370 void cache_content_print_conf_gc_policy( FILE * output,  cache_content_gc_policy_t  gcpolicy )
00371 {
00372   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Lifetime              = %u\n",   (unsigned int)gcpolicy.lifetime ) ;
00373   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Df_HighWater          = %u%%\n", gcpolicy.hwmark_df ) ;
00374   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Df_LowWater           = %u%%\n", gcpolicy.lwmark_df ) ;
00375   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Emergency Grace Delay = %u\n",   (unsigned int)gcpolicy.emergency_grace_delay ) ;
00376   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Nb_Call_Before_GC     = %u\n",   gcpolicy.nb_call_before_gc ) ;
00377   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Runtime_Interval      = %u\n",   gcpolicy.run_interval ) ;
00378 } /* cache_content_print_gc_pol */
